headline: 2 Reasons to Avoid NTRS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Northern Trust has been a great trade, beating the S&P 500 by 18.8%. Its stock price has climbed to $134.70, representing a healthy 37.5% increase. This was partly thanks to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
